dcterms:creator: A. Strandburg-Peshkin
dcterms:description: The dataset consists of two-dimensional time series of fish movement recorded by video, focusing on information propagation over the visual fields of fish. It includes coordination events with around 600 time steps and approximately 70 individuals, where trained fish lead the group to feeding sites.
dcterms:title: Schools of fish

dcterms:creator: M. C. Crofoot
R. W. Kays
M. Wikelski
dcterms:description: This dataset contains GPS tracking information from 26 members of a troop of olive baboons, recorded at 1 Hz over 10 days. It focuses on a known coordination event where one baboon (ID3) initiates movement followed by the rest of the troop.
dcterms:title: Troop of baboons

dcterms:creator: A. Strandburg-Peshkin
D. R. Farine
I. D. Couzin
M. C. Crofoot
dcterms:description: This dataset also involves the movement of a troop of olive baboons, focusing on shared decision-making and collective movement dynamics within the troop.
dcterms:title: Troop of baboons (another citation)
